more_content:
The best part about happy hour is it rarely lasts just an hour. Plus, drinks taste better when they’re at half price. Want to start your evening with a little happy hour action while in Key West? As of summer 2018, here are the best spots on the island for that awesome happy hour deal you’re looking for.

Alonzo’s Oyster Bar

Alonzo’s easily has the best food at the best price during happy hour in Key West. Running 4 to 6:30 daily, make a meal of it sampling fresh Key West seafood appetizers at half-price. The deal is so tempting, it’s hard not to go overboard while ordering. Drinks are also half price!

Half Shell Raw Bar

Happy hour at Half Shell Raw Bar is favored across the island. Wind down with half-price beer, well drinks and house wine from 4:30 - 6:30 daily while enjoying the outdoor scene. Order raw oysters, steamed clams or fish dip to your order at additional killer prices. See happy hour menu here.

Republica Bar & Lounge

Our small indoor bar and lounge at 24 North Hotel is the perfect reprieve from the heat. If you happen to work as a teacher, EMT, fireman, hospital worker. in the police department or serve in the military, enjoy half-off drinks every Friday from 5 to 8 pm! If you don’t fit into the above category, come by for a $5 mojito available Mondays from 4 to 11 pm.

Schooner Wharf Bar

Morning happy hour, anyone? Head to the Schooner Wharf Bar for happy hour, available from 7 am to noon and 5 pm to 7 pm daily. Morning happy hour includes bloody marys, mimosas and fernet at friendly prices, as well as a full breakfast menu. When in Key West...

Turtle Kraals

The best part about happy hour at Turtle Kraals is the food specials. Well drinks, domestic beers and house wine are all half-off, but the appetizers are where it’s at. Enjoy the best deals on raw oysters, fried calamari, wings and more. See the happy hour menu here.

Do you know another good happy hour deal in Key West? Leave a comment below.

--

 

Thinking of booking a trip to Key West? See specials at 24 North Hotel in New Town.
title: Best Happy Hour Deals in Key West
